what_it_is.description: AI-augmented operations hub for support, quality, and operations. Not a chatbot - an AI colleague with access to real business systems.
what_it_is.key_differentiator: Tool use, not just retrieval. Atlas DOES things - looks up warranty status, walks through troubleshooting, drafts RMAs, notifies ops via Slack.

multi_agent_routing.L1_haiku: Quick help, order info, basic FAQ

integrations: Telemetry (live device data - water usage, CO2, filter status, errors)
RAG pipeline (semantic search across all documentation)

phase_1_complete.name: Chat Console
features: Live chat and email draft modes
Streaming responses with tool execution visibility

phase_2_complete.name: Quality Hub
features: Automatic pattern detection from support conversations
Occurrence tracking linking cases to tickets

outcomes.status: Projected targets - will be validated Q1 2026

principles.name: Augmentation Over Automation
principles.description: AI handles data lookup, pattern matching, drafts. Humans handle judgment, empathy, edge cases.

principles.name: Integration Over Isolation
principles.description: Connected to actual business systems - Shopify, HubSpot, Slack, telemetry. No copy-paste.

principles.name: Quality Through Structure
principles.description: Every response validated. Every pattern tracked. Every escalation logged.

key_insight.quote: AI has crossed a threshold. It can now hold context, use tools, follow complex instructions, and work within safety guardrails.
key_insight.implication: The question isn't whether AI will transform operationsâ€”it's who builds the systems that channel that capability productively.

why_this_succeeds_vs_failures: Specific problem scope (support ops), not vague 'AI transformation'
Built by people who understand the problem (internal team)
Multi-agent with intelligent routing (right model for right task)
Integrated with actual business systems (not isolated)
what_to_recommend: Start with support/operations - highest proven ROI
Use vendor AI platforms with integration capabilities
Connect to existing systems, don't create silos
Phase rollout - prove value before expanding
